verbose_text: From the spleen cDNA library, the genes were sub-cloned into a pTagRFP-N vector (Evrogen) by PCR, with the aid of restriction enzymes SacII and Xho I. All the PCR products of T-bet, GATA-3 and TGF-beta genes and the pTagRFP-N vector were digested with endonuclease (New England Biolabs, MA, USA) and ligated (T4 DNA ligase) to generate the mentioned constructs.
